verses.verse: I am the <S%H1397>man<s%> that hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6040>affliction<s%> by the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5678>wrath<s%>.
He hath <S%H5090>led<s%> me and <S%H3212>caused<s%> me to walk in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and not in <S%H216>light<s%>.
Surely against me he <S%H7725>turneth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2015>again<s%> and again all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and my <S%H5785>skin<s%> hath he made <S%H1086>old<s%>; he hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
He hath builded <S%H1129>against<s%> <S%H5362>me<s%>, and compassed me with <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H8513>travail<s%>.
He hath <S%H3427>made<s%> me to dwell in dark <S%H4285>places<s%>, as those that have been <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
He hath <S%H1443>walled<s%> me <S%H3318>about<s%>, that I cannot go forth; he hath made my <S%H5178>chain<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>.
Yea <S%H2199><s%>, when I cry, and <S%H2199>call<s%> for <S%H5640>help<s%>, he shutteth out my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>.
He hath <S%H1443>walled<s%> up my <S%H1870>ways<s%> with hewn <S%H1496>stone<s%>; he hath made my <S%H5410>paths<s%> <S%H5753>crooked<s%>.
He is unto me as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> lying in <S%H693>wait<s%>, as a <S%H738>lion<s%> in secret <S%H4565>places<s%>.
He hath turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and pulled me in <S%H6582>pieces<s%>; he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
He hath <S%H1869>bent<s%> his <S%H7198>bow<s%>, and <S%H5324>set<s%> me as a <S%H4307>mark<s%> for the <S%H2671>arrow<s%>.
He hath caused the <S%H1121>shafts<s%> of his <S%H827>quiver<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into my <S%H3629>reins<s%>.
I am become a <S%H7814>derision<s%> to all my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and their <S%H5058>song<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
He hath <S%H7646>filled<s%> me with <S%H4844>bitterness<s%>, he hath <S%H7301>sated<s%> me with <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>.
He hath also <S%H1638>broken<s%> my <S%H8127>teeth<s%> with gravel <S%H2687>stones<s%>; he hath <S%H3728>covered<s%> me with <S%H665>ashes<s%>.
And thou hast <S%H2186>removed<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> far <S%H2186>off<s%> from <S%H7965>peace<s%>; I <S%H5382>forgat<s%> <S%H2896>prosperity<s%>.
And I <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H5331>strength<s%> is <S%H6>perished<s%>, and mine <S%H8431>expectation<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H4788>misery<s%>, the <S%H3939>wormwood<s%> and the <S%H7219>gall<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath them <S%H2142>still<s%> in <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>, and is bowed down within <S%H7743>me<s%>.
This I <S%H7725>recall<s%> to my <S%H3820>mind<s%>; therefore have I <S%H3176>hope<s%>.
It is of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%> that we are not <S%H8552>consumed<s%>, because his <S%H7356>compassions<s%> fail <S%H3615>not<s%>.
They are <S%H2319>new<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%>; <S%H7227>great<s%> is thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is my <S%H2506>portion<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; therefore will I hope in <S%H3176>him<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> unto them that <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H5315>him<s%>, to the soul that seeketh <S%H1875>him<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that a man should <S%H3175>hope<s%> and quietly <S%H1748>wait<s%> for the <S%H8668>salvation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for a <S%H1397>man<s%> that he <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> in his <S%H5271>youth<s%>.
Let him <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> and keep <S%H1826>silence<s%>, because he hath laid it upon <S%H5190>him<s%>.
Let him put his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, if so <S%H3426>be<s%> there may <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>.
Let him <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H3895>cheek<s%> to him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> <S%H7646>him<s%>; let him be filled full with <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.
For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will not cast <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
For though he cause <S%H3013>grief<s%>, yet will he have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H2617>lovingkindnesses<s%>.
For he doth not <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3820>willingly<s%>, nor <S%H3013>grieve<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>.
To <S%H1792>crush<s%> under <S%H7272>foot<s%> all the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>,
To turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%> before the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>,
To <S%H5791>subvert<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> in his <S%H7379>cause<s%>, the <S%H136>Lord<s%> approveth <S%H7200>not<s%>.
Who is he that <S%H559>saith<s%>, and it cometh to <S%H136>pass<s%>, when the Lord commandeth it <S%H6680>not<s%>?
Out of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H3318>cometh<s%> there not <S%H7451>evil<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>?
Wherefore doth a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H596>complain<s%>, a <S%H1397>man<s%> for the punishment of his <S%H2399>sins<s%>?
Let us <S%H2664>search<s%> and <S%H2713>try<s%> our <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Let us lift <S%H5375>up<s%> our <S%H3824>heart<s%> with our <S%H3709>hands<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.
We <S%H5168><s%> have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> and have <S%H4784>rebelled<s%>; thou hast not <S%H5545>pardoned<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> with <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H2026>us<s%>; thou hast slain, thou hast not <S%H2550>pitied<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H5526>covered<s%> thyself with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, so that no <S%H8605>prayer<s%> can pass <S%H5674>through<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7760>made<s%> us an <S%H5501>off-scouring<s%> and <S%H3973>refuse<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
All our <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H6475>opened<s%> their mouth wide against <S%H6310>us<s%>.
Fear <S%H6343><s%> and the <S%H6354>pit<s%> are come upon <S%H7612>us<s%>, devastation and <S%H7667>destruction<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> runneth <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6388>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, for the <S%H7667>destruction<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> poureth <S%H5064>down<s%>, and <S%H1820>ceaseth<s%> <S%H2014>not<s%>, without any intermission,
Till <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> look <S%H8259>down<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H5953>affecteth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, because of all the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of my <S%H5892>city<s%>.
They have <S%H6679>chased<s%> me <S%H6679>sore<s%> like a <S%H6833>bird<s%>, they that are mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>.
They have cut <S%H6789>off<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> in the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>, and have <S%H3034>cast<s%> a stone upon <S%H68>me<s%>.
Waters <S%H4325><s%> flowed <S%H6687>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>; I <S%H559>said<s%>, I am cut <S%H1504>off<s%>.
I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, out of the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>dungeon<s%>.
Thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; <S%H5956>hide<s%> not thine <S%H241>ear<s%> at my <S%H7309>breathing<s%>, at my <S%H7775>cry<s%>.
Thou drewest <S%H7126>near<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H559>thee<s%>; thou saidst, Fear <S%H3372>not<s%>.
O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, thou hast <S%H7378>pleaded<s%> the <S%H7379>causes<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; thou hast <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%>.
O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H5792>wrong<s%>; <S%H8199>judge<s%> thou my <S%H4941>cause<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> all their <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> and all their devices against <S%H4284>me<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and all their devices against <S%H4284>me<s%>,
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of those that rose <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H1902>me<s%>, and their device against me all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Behold <S%H5027><s%> thou their sitting <S%H3427>down<s%>, and their rising <S%H7012>up<s%>; I am their <S%H4485>song<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H7725>render<s%> unto them a <S%H1576>recompense<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H4044>hardness<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, thy curse unto <S%H8381>them<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H7291>pursue<s%> them in <S%H639>anger<s%>, and <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them from under the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
